alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 5:24PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Umatilla County through 600 PM PDT... At 523 PM PDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Rieth, or 9 miles west of Pendleton, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph moving north through Umatilla County. Possible penny size hail in the Pendleton area. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walla Walla, Hermiston, Pendleton, Milton-Freewater, Stanfield, Athena, Echo, Weston, Adams, Helix, Cayuse, Holdman, Rieth, Mission and northwestern Umatilla Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon
